title: S Line
overview: A young woman with the ability to see mysterious red connections between lovers discovers her secret gift is no longer unique when special glasses granting similar powers appear on the black market.

tv.episodeOverview: Hyun-heup, a girl who was born with the ability to see the S-line that indicates sexual relations. Because of this ability, Hyun-heup's family faces tragedy, and Hyun-heup becomes a reclusive loner for a long time. Then one day, a series of suspicious murders occur around Hyun-heup, and Hyun-heup uses his ability to see the S-line to track down the case...
